about_the_game:
Welcome to Square Escape Challenge, a thrilling platformer adventure that tests your reflexes, strategy, and timing! Guide your square through challenging levels filled with hazards, enemies, and obstacles. Reach the exit point while avoiding dangers and collecting valuable gems to continue your journey and unlock exciting skins. Can you escape every level?

Exciting Gameplay In Square Escape Challenge, each level is packed with enemies, hazards, and tricky paths. Use your skills to dodge obstacles, jump over spikes, and outmaneuver enemies to make it to the exit. As you progress, the levels become increasingly difficult, pushing you to react faster and think strategically.

Collect Gems and Unlock Skins Gems are your key to survival! Use them to continue from where you left off or unlock cool new skins to personalize your character.

Dodge Deadly Hazards From moving enemies to spikes and bottomless pits, every level introduces new challenges. Stay alert, plan your moves, and find the safest path to the exit. The further you go, the tougher it gets!

Why You’ll Love Square Escape Challenge

  • Fast-Paced Action: Exciting platformer gameplay that keeps you on your toes.

  • Unlockable Skins: Collect gems to customize your character.

  • Competitive Fun: Challenge yourself to reach the end of each level.

  • Immersive Graphics & Sounds: A visually appealing world with engaging sound effects.

Perfect for Quick Gaming Sessions Whether you have a few minutes or an hour, Square Escape Challenge is perfect for short bursts of action-packed fun. Play on the go and test your skills anytime, anywhere.

Join the Challenge Today! Are you ready to jump, dodge, and escape? Wishlist today and prepare for an epic Adventure Challenges to escape!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5250U processor
  • Memory: 2GB RAM MB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 processor
  • Memory: 2GB RAM MB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

name: Square Escape Challenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: 1.0 GHz
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit / Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with OpenGL 2.1+ support
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

short_description: Challenge your reflexes in Square Escape Challenge! Avoid deadly traps, hazards, dodge enemies, collect gems, and unlock skins in this fast-paced platformer game. Are you ready for the challenge? Wishlist now and get ready to embark on an epic challenges!
